title: White Sands National Monument: Past Projects
body: Past Projects       Historic Residence Rehabilitation Between 1937 and 1939, the Works Progress Administration built sturctures at White Sands National Monument to house park staff and serve visitors. In 2005, rehabilitation of the housing structures was completed. Read more...  Â    Interdune Boardwalk Executive Summary In 2004, it became necessary to replace the original wooden Boardwalk due to excessive weathering. By 2005, a new Boardwalk was constructed. Read more...
